title: The Return
description:
A GOOD GIRLS GUIDE TO MURDER MEETS ONE OF US IS LYING IN THIS YOUNG ADULT CRIME THRILLER




The cheer captain is dead and someone is hiding something.

-
A body is uncovered in an empty classroom at Lincoln Lane Prep, West Jackson Boulevard, it’s ruled an accident. A heroin overdose. The case is closed within a month.
Holly Steinfeld already has enough on her plate with her parent’s re-engagement, school, and settling into a town she once considered a distant memory.
But who can resist a good mystery?
Enthralled by the Leighton case—teenage girl found drugged and dead on the night of her prom—Holly enlists the help of four unlikely kids and together, they find themselves digging into a world of lies, secrets and manipulation to uncover what really happened to Scarlett on the night of her prom.
Can she reopen a cold case and make it back in time for her parent’s wedding?
author: Nenny May
